name: Fantasy World and History Generator
description:
This is my second project for my portfolio.  As such, it is focused on code and the gameplay loop only extends so far. If you want a more interesting game, you can check out the rest of my profile here on itch.io.

As you can see on the trailer, this project offers random stylized world generation and history simulation for people who want a setting idea for their novels, films, games, etc. The world can be saved and loaded and their histories replayed at will.
